name: Explore bois
description:
The chad inventors of the universe figured out space travel was possible.. but it required a cost, that only the bois were willing to pay. Mobility!

With this simulation software, you too can experience what it's like to be one of the bois and step in the chad inventors' spaceship.

You can play the game with 1-10 players at the same time.  There is a little bug through which only the first round it waits for everyone but afterwards it doesn't anymore. I will fix this post-jam.

-----------For some strange reason the Browser version doesnt play in my window but does play on first load, so I've added a dowlnoadable windows build just to be sure.------------------------- Will check back later and fix. am tired :P
